description:
TVs, Home Cinema and Digital Displays are getting more and more advanced every year and new technologies constantly appear like Plasma, OLED, 4K, 3D and Virtual Reality. Choosing the best TV for yourself could be a difficult task as it's easy to spend money on features you don't really need.

TV manufacturers want you to buy the largest and most expensive TV so understanding what you are paying for can save you a lot of money. Make sure you only buy that 4K TV if you really need it!

This course will teach you all about these technologies from the basics to help you understand the benefits of every single feature. Next time you visit your electronic store you will be able to make a choice that best suite your requirements and living room.

In this course you will:

  • Understand what the ultimate visual experience is
  • Look at the history of TVs, monitors and mobile phone displays
  • Learn about pixels, pixel arrays and LCD, Plasma and OLED panel types
  • Learn about IPS and TN panels, LED backlighting and black levels
  • Understand the difference between 720p, 1080p, Full HD, 4K, 8K
  • Look at the different TV sizes and how it affects your field of view
  • Understand what HFR video is and wether you should buy Active or Passive 3D
  • Learn about Virtual Reality
  • Be able to calculate the perfect TV size, resolution and viewing distance combination for your own living room
title: Ultimate TV and Home Cinema Display Guide
